name: Timothy For Change
profession: A Platform for Critical Humanitarian Analysis
bio: Deconstructing the imperialist and capitalist roots of humanitarian crises across the Global South, from Palestine to the Sahel. The goal is to move beyond conventional charity and towards informed, meaningful solidarity with movements for justice.

links.title: GiveDirectly
links.description: A non-profit that sends money directly to people living in extreme poverty, letting them decide how to best improve their lives

links.title: ShareTheMeal
links.description: A UN World Food Programme initiative that lets you donate meals to children and families in crisis with just one tap

links.title: WaterAid
links.description: An international non-profit working to make clean water, decent toilets, and good hygiene normal for everyone, everywhere
